analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol:
	Contract RingDEXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol#99-100)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of RingDEXToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol#193-194) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of RingDEXToken.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol#194) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of RingDEXToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol#213-214) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of RingDEXToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd2956a5a1ab7e7983fe68cb270ae8c0abe8c74.sol#214) is not in mixedCase
